articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: England fortunes still rooted in former captain
articles.description: Joe Root's hunger to succeed with England burns as bright as ever after a masterful unbeaten 115 carried the side to a five-wicket victory over New Zealand in the first Test at Lord's on Sunday.

articles.title: Focus is to keep bowling in right areas, says Umran Malik
articles.description: India's speed sensation Umran Malik has made it clear that he is not focusing on breaking Shoaib Akhtar's fastest delivery record of 161 kph, and said that his plan is to keep bowling in right areas and help India win against South Africa.
